member.name: M:Users.API.Write.Controllers.v1.UsersController.Post(Users.API.Models.Request.v1.AddUserRequest)
member.param: An AddUserRequest object which contains all the necessary data to create a user
member.returns: A URI to the newly added user in the header (location)
member.response: Success - Added - The user was successfully Added
Error - Bad Request - It was not possible to bind the request JSON

member.name: M:Users.API.Write.Controllers.v1.UsersController.Delete(System.Guid)
member.param: The unique identifier of the user
member.response: Success - No Content - User was successfully deleted
Error - Bad Request - It was not possible to bind the request JSON
Error - Not Found - No user matched the given identifier

member.name: M:Users.API.Write.Controllers.v1.UsersController.Put(System.Guid,Users.API.Models.Request.v1.UpdateUserRequest)
member.param: The unique identifier of the user
An UpdateUserRequest object which contains the data required to update a user.
member.response: Success - OK - The user was successfully updated
Error - Not Found - Could not find the corresponding user for the given identifier
Error - Unprocessable Entity - It was not possible to bind the request JSON

member.name: M:Users.API.Write.Controllers.v1.UsersController.Patch(System.Guid,Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.JsonPatchDocument{Users.API.Models.Request.v1.PartiallyUpdateUserRequest})
member.summary: Fully or partially update an existing user
member.param: The unique identifier of the user
A JSON Patch Document detailing the full or partial updates to the user
member.response: Success - OK - The user was successfully updated
Error - Bad Request - It was not possible to bind the request JSON
Error - Not Found - Could not find the corresponding user for the given identifier
Error - Unprocessable Entity - Unable to process the contained instructions
member.remarks: Sample request (this request updates the user's first name): \ PATCH /users/id \ [ \ { \ "op": "replace", \ "path": "/firstname", \ "value": "Bob" \ } \ ] \
